name: VOWST

indications.text: vowst indicated prevent recurrence clostridioides difficile infection ( cdi ) individuals 18 years age older following antibacterial treatment recurrent cdi ( rcdi ) .

contraindications.text: oral . ( 2 ) prior taking first dose : complete antibacterial treatment rcdi 2 4 days initiating treatment vowst . ( 2.1 ) drink 296 ml ( 10 oz ) magnesium citrate day least 8 hours prior taking first dose vowst . , participants impaired kidney function received polyethylene glycol electrolyte solution ( 250 ml golytely , approved ) . ( 2.1 ) vowst 4 capsules taken orally daily 3 consecutive days . ( 2.2 ) take dose ( 4 capsules ) empty stomach prior first meal day . ( 2.2 )

warningsAndPrecautions: vowst supplied capsules bottles child-resistant caps . bottle contains 12 white capsules imprinted `` ser109 `` . bottle supplied carton . bottles 12 capsules : ndc 71881-400-12 .
indications_original: VOWST is indicated to prevent the recurrence of Clostridioides difficile infection (CDI) in individuals 18 years of age and older following antibacterial treatment for recurrent CDI (rCDI).
contraindications_original: For oral administration only. ( 2 ) Prior to taking the first dose: Complete antibacterial treatment for rCDI 2 to 4 days before initiating treatment with VOWST. ( 2.1 ) Drink 296 mL (10 oz) of magnesium citrate on the day before and at least 8 hours prior to taking the first dose of VOWST. In clinical studies, participants with impaired kidney function received polyethylene glycol electrolyte solution (250 mL GoLYTELY, not approved for this use). ( 2.1 ) The dosage of VOWST is 4 capsules taken orally once daily for 3 consecutive days. ( 2.2 ) Take each dose (4 capsules) on an empty stomach prior to the first meal of the day. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
VOWST is supplied as capsules in bottles with child-resistant caps. Each bottle contains 12 white capsules imprinted with "SER109". Each bottle is supplied in a carton.
                  Bottles of 12 capsules:  NDC 71881-400-12.
